product_name: The North Face Voracious Dual Shorts - Men's
long_description: Chase your best time in The North Face Voracious Dual Shorts. Polyester and elastane outer shorts breathe well and flow with you when you move; tight-fitting liner shorts add support and reduce the impact of vibration on your muscles. Ventilation areas are positioned to reduce clamminess and vent warm air. Fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Zippered pocket offers a place to stow small essentials. Locker loop. The North Face Voracious Dual Shorts feature reflective logos to increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: Chase your best time in The North Face Voracious Dual Shorts.
